TemporalDirections.TEXT: ,Character,Dialogue,EpisodeNo,SEID,Season 52750,GEORGE,"Yes, I, uh, I need to return this book.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52751,CASHIER,"(Puts the book's code into the computer) I'm sorry, we can't take this book back.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52752,GEORGE,Why not?,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52753,CASHIER,It's been flagged.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52754,GEORGE,(Confused) Flagged?,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52755,CASHIER,It's been in the bathroom.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52756,GEORGE,It says that on the computer?,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52757,CASHIER,Please take it home. We don't want it near the other books.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52758,GEORGE,"(Outraged. Leaving) Well, you just lost a lot of business! Because I love to read!",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52759,JERRY,"(To himself) I don't believe this! (Walks over to a security guard) Excuse me, I wonder if you could do me a favor? My uncle's having a little problem with shoplifting..",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52760,GUARD,Mm-hmm. Where's your uncle?,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52761,JERRY,"(Pointing) He's over there in the overcoat. If you could just kind of put a scare into him.. You know, set him straight..",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52762,GAURD,(Into his walkie-talkie) We have a 51-50 in paperbacks. All units respond.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52763,JERRY,"'51-50'? That - that's just a scare, right?",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52764,GUARD,"Sir, I'm gonna have to ask you to stand out of the way and let us handle this. (The Guard rushes tward Uncle Leo) Swarm! Swarm!",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52765,LEO,What?! I'm an old man! I'm confused!,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52766,GUARD,You're under arrest.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52767,JERRY,(To Guard) I just wanted you to scare him.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52768,LEO,"Jerry, you ratted me out?!",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52769,JERRY,(Unsure of what to say - he remember's Leo's courtesy tip) Hello?,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52770,LEO,Hello.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52771,[Setting,Jerry's apartment],17.0,S09E17,9.0 52772,JERRY,"Mom, I didn't rat out Uncle Leo. I just wanted the guard to scare him straight.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52773,HELEN,"Jerry, he won't last a day in prison.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52774,JERRY,(Scoffing) Prison. I'm sure it's just a fine.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52775,MORTY,She's got priors.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52776,JERRY,(Not believeing it) Prior convictions? Leo?,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52777,HELEN,It was a crime of passion. Leave it alone.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52778,MORTY,"Besides, it's not stealing if it's something you need.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52779,JERRY,(Confused) What does that mean?,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52780,HELEN,Nobody pays for everyting.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52781,JERRY,(Shocked at his parents) You're stealing too?!,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52782,MORTY,"Nothing. Batteries. (Jerry scoffs) Well, they wear out so quick.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52783,JERRY,"Mom, you too?",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52784,HELEN,"Sometimes your father forgets, so I have to steal them.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52785,JERRY,"Alright, I'll talk to you later.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52786,KRAMER,"(While washing his hands in Jerry's kithen sink) Well, the rickshaw's gone. We strapped it to a homeless guy and he (Makes a noise), he bolted.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52787,JERRY,"(Joking around) Well, you know, eighty-five percent of all homeless rickshaw businesses fail within the first three months.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52788,KRAMER,"(To Newman) See, we should've gotten some collateral from him.. Like his bag of cans, or.. his other bag of cans.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52789,NEWMAN,"We gotta find that rickshaw. You check the sewers and dumpsters. I'll hit the soup kitchens, bakeries, and smorgasbords.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52790,JERRY,To the Idiotmobile!,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52791,[Setting,The Coffee shop],17.0,S09E17,9.0 52792,JERRY,"So, even though you're not really going out with this guy, he's cheating on you?",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52793,ELAINE,"That is correct. But here's the beauty part - now I stand up for myself by telling everybody I'm dumping his sorry ass, and I'm the office-",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52794,JERRY,(Butting in) Tina Turner?,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52795,ELAINE,(Accepting) Alright.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52796,GEORGE,"Well, I've to every Brentano's. This thing's flagged in every database in town!",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52797,JERRY,Is it so horrible to have to keep a book?,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52798,GEORGE,I don't understand what the big deal is. They let you try on pants.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52799,JERRY,(Stern on George) Not underpants.,17.0,S09E17,9.0

DIRECTION.text: Puts the book's code into the computer
Walks over to a security guard
The Guard rushes tward Uncle Leo
Unsure of what to say - he remember's Leo's courtesy tip
While washing his hands in Jerry's kithen sink

DIALOGUE.text: I'm sorry, we can't take this book back.
Well, you just lost a lot of business! Because I love to read!
Excuse me, I wonder if you could do me a favor?
He's over there in the overcoat.
I just wanted you to scare him.
Well, they wear out so quick.
Well, you know, eighty-five percent of all homeless rickshaw businesses fail within the first three months.
See, we should've gotten some collateral from him..
